definition_gloss: to raise; appoint; (intran) rise, stand up, appear
(3rd person pronoun) he/she/it/they;  (intensive) himself, herself, itself; (identical) same
to become parent of, beget, give birth to
to come to know, learn, know, realize
(Gen) through; (Acc) because of, on account of
to be able to, to be powerful, can
to ask (for), question, demand of x
(Gen) on, upon; (Dat) on, near; (Acc) on, against
to want to, wish to, desire
(Gen) down (from), against; (Acc) along,  according to, during, throughout
remaining; the rest (as a noun); for the rest, henceforth (as an adverb)
to be going to, be about to
on the one hand, indeed (postpositive particle indicating contrast, emphasis or continuation; often untranslated)
as much / great / many as, how much
that, because, since, (or introduce direct quotation)
and not, not even, neither, nor
(Gen) from; (Dat) with, near beside; (Acc), alongside of
to give / hand over; deliver up, arrest; betray
to beg, urge, encourage, request, comfort
to believe, trust, have faith (in); entrust
spirit, the Spirit; self; wind; breath
to go, proceed, travel; live, walk
(Acc) to, toward; (Dat) at, on; (Gen) for the sake of
to go, go away, go back, depart
(Gen) for, for sake of; (Acc) over, above, beyond
